title: Epochs of Eternity
description: Based on characters by Ex-Sir Anthony Bonham Pease, the Inspector is now American, visiting interesting new locations like San Francisco, but always with his loyal Ensign.
quote: Now I must sleep with the sexiest woman here, who is also my grandmother, or I will cease to exist.
alt1: a man in a white hat emerges from a phone booth
alt2: the Inspector in front of the Golden Gate Bridge

alt4: the Inspector and his Ensign smolder
